product_name: Lole Pinnacle Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: On hot days you'll find lots of excuses to wear the organic-cotton Lole Pinnacle Tank Top. It's soft and stretchy and just feels darn good. Wear it under a hoodie on cooler days, or as a pajama top! Organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides and offers breathable comfort and easy care. A touch of elastane helps tank hold its shape nicely and allows you to pull it on and off with ease. Fabric offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Lole Pinnacle Tank Top features a scoop neck and racerback. Closeout.
short_description: On hot days you'll find lots of excuses to wear the organic-cotton Lole Pinnacle Tank Top. It's soft and stretchy and just feels darn good. Wear it under a hoodie on cooler days, or as a pajama top!
